text: Now that the scandal is behind him, the comedian is speaking freely about it and recently shared how his wife chose to forgive him during the trying time in their union. Kevin Hart made headlines almost a year ago when he was publicly and virally exposed for stepping out in his marriage to wife Eniko Hart. In an interview with People, the Night School star said he is now a better man because of the cheating scandal heard across the web. ` ` I am amazing,'' he said. ` ` I am amazing because I get it now.'' The actor / comic, in the aftermath of the incident, took to social media to publicly apologize to his then - pregnant wife for what he called a ` ` bad error in judgment.''
